  • ENAGAR

    Most of the people in India are tired of wandering around municipality offices for getting various govt. services. There is a lot delay in processing files, taxes, register certificates, pay bills it can be processed only at the corporation office. ENAGAR is a virtual replacement where we can also register complaints such as waste accumulation and customer feedback .

  • Services

    eNagar provide a wide range of services to the citizens such as Complaints and Grievances, Registration of Birth, Death, & Marriage, Professional Tax, Building Permission, Estate Management, Hall booking etc.. with online payment gateway facilities.

  • Rich of features

    24/7 CHATBOT SERVICE
